topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/544860276368724fc42a0000#post_544860276368724fc42a0000
Alright history lesson.
Some shit went down in the Marvel universe. Said shit lead to the "Superhuman Registration Act." Some people were down down with it, some thought it was a breach of privacy and could potentially do more harm than good.  The Pro and Anti registration factions had a few kerfuffles.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5448615b6368722ad4ac0200#post_5448615b6368722ad4ac0200
I never thought about why a super hero would be anti registration but it makes sense actually. Protecting loved ones and such. 

also "FNAF has officially joined the shitstorm!":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CHsNt6Yyc2g
probably one of the better playthroughs of it. I love hearing pat lose his shit.
